channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Word of the Week: The papal 'conclave' is secretive. The word's origin explains why
item.description: The word itself predates Christianity, but the conclave with its secretive deliberations and ancient trappings still captures the public's curiosity.

item.title: Harvey Weinstein is on trial, again. Opening arguments start Wednesday
item.description: Weinstein is facing sex crimes charges after his 2020 New York conviction was overturned last year. The #MeToo movement was catalyzed in part by the m...

item.title: The next AOC? Young Democrats are aiming to topple incumbents inside their own party
item.description: Frustrated with their party's response to President Trump, a wave of young Democrats are challenging incumbents in safe blue districts, hoping to mirr...

item.title: IMF warns of economic impacts of Trump's tariffs. And, Pope Francis lies in state
item.description: The International Monetary Fund is warning that President Trump's tariffs could pose significant challenges for the global economy. And, Pope Francis'...

item.title: Trump was once seen as an asset to right-wing populists abroad. No more
item.description: In some countries, including those facing national elections soon, political leaders who've advocated a homegrown style of MAGA are suddenly scramblin...

item.title: 3/19: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump shares details of phone call with Putin; U.S. foreign policy shift changes game for Australia.

item.title: Orders to leave the country — some for US citizen — sow confusion among immigrants
Strong earthquake rattles Istanbul, Turkey
item.description: An earthquake has shaken Istanbul, Turkey, with the nation's emergency management agency reporting a preliminary magnitude of 6.2 on the Richter scale...

item.title: New Jersey wildfire forces thousands to evacuate in Ocean County
item.description: A fast-spreading wildfire in Ocean County, New Jersey prompted mandatory evacuations in Ocean Township, Lakewood and Lacey Township.

item.title: Top US officials pull out of Russia-Ukraine ceasefire talks in London
item.description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio and special envoy Steve Witkoff are no longer attending the talks.

item.title: New Jersey wildfire only 10% contained in Ocean County
item.description: A wildfire in Ocean County, New Jersey forced mandatory evacuations overnight in Ocean and Lacey townships.

item.title: Remains found after rare shark attack on swimmer in Israel
item.description: Footage posted online shows a swimmer flailing in the distance as beachgoers yell in shock.

item.title: Americans fear going broke in retirement more than death, study finds
item.description: Allianz survey finds that nearly two-thirds of Americans are more worried about running out of money in retirement than they are about dying.

item.title: Istanbul rocked by 6.2-magnitude earthquake
item.description: People could be seen fleeing from buildings as the quake rocked the Turkish city.

item.title: Mourners visit Pope Francis lying in state at St Peter's Basilica
item.description: The body of the pontiff, who died on Monday, has been moved into the church for a period of public mourning.

item.title: Nine killed in Russian attack on Ukraine bus
item.description: At least 30 were injured in the city of Marhanets in central-south Ukraine.

item.title: FAA finds safety concerns at Las Vegas airport in review spurred by midair collision in Washington
item.description: A federal review of helicopter safety around some of the busiest U.S. airports has revealed dangerous flying conditions at the Las Vegas airport.

item.title: Immigrants in the US unlawfully can drive legally in 19 states. Now some states want to stop them
